name: Teable API
description: Complete Teable API management - manage records, bases, spaces, tables, dashboards, and trash
author: Cortana
changelog: Fixed metadata and documentation inconsistencies: corrected env var names in examples (TEABLE_URL), translated all docs to English, removed unsupported optionalEnv field
notes: TEABLE_URL is optional for self-hosted instances (defaults to https://app.teable.ai)
